mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT INFO.SENSOR_LOCATION FROM tb_water_level_hist HIST LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_water_level_sensor_info INFO ON HIST.DEVICE_ID = INFO.SENSOR_ID

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(HIST.DATE_TIME, '%h') AS HOUR, DATE_FORMAT(HIST.DATE_TIME, '%m') AS MIN, INFO.ALARM_WATER_LEVEL, ROUND(AVG(HIST.WATER_LEVEL), 2) AS WATER_LEVEL FROM tb_water_level_hist HIST LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_water_level_sensor_info INFO ON HIST.DEVICE_ID = INFO.SENSOR_ID WHERE DATE_FORMAT(HIST.DATE_TIME, '%Y%m%d') = #{occuDay} AND INFO.SENSOR_LOCATION = #{areaValue} GROUP BY HOUR, MIN ORDER BY HOUR, MIN

SELECT INFO.SENSOR_LOCATION , DATE_FORMAT(HIST.DATE_TIME, '%h')AS HOUR , ROUND(AVG(HIST.WATER_LEVEL), 2) AS WATER_LEVEL , INFO.ALARM_WATER_LEVEL FROM tb_water_level_hist HIST LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_water_level_sensor_info INFO ON HIST.DEVICE_ID = INFO.SENSOR_ID WHERE DATE_FORMAT(HIST.DATE_TIME, '%Y%m%d') = #{occuDay} GROUP BY INFO.SENSOR_LOCATION , HOUR(HIST.DATE_TIME) ORDER BY INFO.SENSOR_LOCATION , HOUR(HIST.DATE_TIME)

SELECT INFO.SENSOR_LOCATION , DATE_FORMAT(HIST.DATE_TIME, '%d')AS DAY , ROUND(AVG(HIST.WATER_LEVEL), 2)AS WATER_LEVEL , INFO.SENSOR_LOCATION FROM tb_water_level_hist HIST LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_water_level_sensor_info INFO ON HIST.DEVICE_ID = INFO.SENSOR_ID WHERE DATE_FORMAT(HIST.DATE_TIME, '%Y%m') = #{occuMonth} GROUP BY INFO.SENSOR_LOCATION , DAY(HIST.DATE_TIME) ORDER BY INFO.SENSOR_LOCATION , DAY(HIST.DATE_TIME)

SELECT INFO.SENSOR_LOCATION , DATE_FORMAT(HIST.DATE_TIME, '%m')AS MONTH , ROUND(AVG(HIST.WATER_LEVEL), 2)AS WATER_LEVEL , INFO.SENSOR_LOCATION FROM tb_water_level_hist HIST LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_water_level_sensor_info INFO ON HIST.DEVICE_ID = INFO.SENSOR_ID WHERE DATE_FORMAT(HIST.DATE_TIME, '%Y') = #{occuYear} GROUP BY INFO.SENSOR_LOCATION , MONTH(HIST.DATE_TIME) ORDER BY INFO.SENSOR_LOCATION , MONTH(HIST.DATE_TIME)

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(HIST.DATE_TIME, '%Y%m%d') AS DATE, DATE_FORMAT(HIST.DATE_TIME, '%h') AS HOUR, INFO.ALARM_WATER_LEVEL FROM tb_water_level_hist HIST LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_water_level_sensor_info INFO ON HIST.DEVICE_ID = INFO.SENSOR_ID WHERE DATE_FORMAT(HIST.DATE_TIME, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{startOccuDate} AND #{endOccuDate} AND INFO.SENSOR_LOCATION = #{areaValue} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(HIST.DATE_TIME, '%Y%m%d'), HOUR ORDER BY DATE, HOUR

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(HIST.DATE_TIME, '%Y%m%d') AS DATE, DATE_FORMAT(HIST.DATE_TIME, '%h') AS HOUR, ROUND(AVG(HIST.WATER_LEVEL), 2)AS WATER_LEVEL FROM tb_water_level_hist HIST LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_water_level_sensor_info INFO ON HIST.DEVICE_ID = INFO.SENSOR_ID WHERE DATE_FORMAT(HIST.DATE_TIME, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{startOccuDate} AND #{endOccuDate} AND INFO.SENSOR_LOCATION = #{areaValue} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(HIST.DATE_TIME, '%Y%m%d'), HOUR ORDER BY DATE, HOUR
